lex.text: Adams County, Pennsylvania is the location of the 11th Mississippi Infantry monument. Franklin County Pennsylvania is to the west and Frederick County to the south west.
lex.template: BRIDGE-1 is the location of AGENT-1 . PATIENT-1 is to the west and PATIENT-2 to the south west .

lex.text: The 11th Mississippi Infantry Monument is located in Adams County Pennsylvania, between Franklin County to the west and Frederick County to the southwest.
lex.template: AGENT-1 is located in BRIDGE-1 , between PATIENT-1 to the west and PATIENT-2 to the southwest .

lex.text: The Baku Turkish Martyr's memorial which is dedicated to the soldiers of the Ottoman army who were killed in the Battle of Baku is located in Azerbaijan. At present Artur Rasizade is the leader of the country.
lex.template: AGENT-1 which is dedicated to PATIENT-2 is located in BRIDGE-1 . At present PATIENT-1 is the leader of BRIDGE-1.

lex.text: The Baku Turkish Martyrs Memorial in Azerbaijan was designed by Hüseyin Bütüner and Hilmi Güner and is dedicated to Ottoman Army soldiers killed in the Battle of Baku.
